sentences.english: The serpents advanced directly to the spot where Laocoon stood with his two sons.
sentences.chinese: 巨蛇逕自來到勞孔和他兩個兒子站著的地方。

sentences.english: The manager inconsiderately allowed the meeting to run well into the lunch hour.
sentences.chinese: 經理未顧及他人尌逕自讓會議進行到午餐時間。

sentences.english: The manager inconsiderately allowed the meeting to run well into the lunch hour.
sentences.chinese: 經理爲顧忌他人就逕自讓會議進行到午餐時間。
